text: welcome to home improvisation the
world's most fun and accurate operative
furniture assembly experience we ship
new and exciting furniture right to your
door we give you a box of flat pack
furniture and you open the box and it
just falls on the floor and a bunch of
pieces first thing you're gonna look for
is their instructions and the answer is
no the game doesn't give you any
instructions as to how to properly put
together the furniture the only real
indication is the picture on the box
manipulating the pieces and putting the
pegs in the holes is a bit intentionally
a bit complicated so that the results
are humorous then these cool we wanted
it to be you where you could play it and
try to make accurate representations of
the furniture we also wanted you to be
able to play it and make monstrosity z'
and strange creations that didn't look
anything like furniture and look more
like abstract art you can play with your
friends and sometimes you'll have like
the person in your group it was really
uptight and wants to do it exactly right
you'll have the other person who's just
doing crazy stuff we made this game as
part of the global Game Jam which is an
event every year where you're given a
theme on the spot and you have to make a
game based on that theme in 48 hours the
theme this year was what do we do now
and we brainstorm several different
concepts but the one that stuck for us
was that's the question that I asked all
the time when I'm assembling IKEA style
furniture
you
